ahmed.quote: The platform is excellent and helped me develop my programming skills. The educational content is high quality and the trainers are outstanding.
ahmed.name: Ahmed Al-Shammari

noura.quote: A unique learning experience. The training courses are comprehensive and very useful for developing professional skills.
noura.name: Noura Al-Qahtani
noura.designation: Development Manager at Gulf Tech Group

abdullah.quote: Tamouh platform helped me achieve my professional goals. The content is practical and very useful in my field of work.
abdullah.name: Abdullah Al-Otaibi
abdullah.designation: Operations Manager at Riyadh Digital Solutions

sara.quote: Excellent technical support and educational content that keeps pace with the latest technologies. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to develop.
sara.name: Sara Al-Hashimi
sara.designation: Head of Programming at Dubai Technologies

mohammed.quote: An integrated platform that meets the needs of the Arab market. The trainers are distinguished and the content is high quality.
mohammed.name: Mohammed Al-Salem

features.courses: Access to all courses without restrictions
features.forum: Access to interactive forum with instructors
features.content: Get new exclusive content every month

step1.title: Step 1: Login or Create Account
step1.description: If you already have an account, you can sign in using your email and password. If you're a new user, create a new account by entering the required information like name, email, password, and account type (school/university).

step2.title: Step 2: Choose Subscription
step2.description: Select the subscription type that suits your educational needs. You can choose between monthly, quarterly, or annual subscriptions based on your study plans and budget.

step3.title: Step 3: Enter Payment Details
step3.description: Please transfer the subscription fee to the following bank account:
step3.note: Please ensure accurate entry of details during transfer to complete the process.

step4.title: Step 4: Upload Payment Receipt
step4.description: After completing the bank transfer, take a clear photo of the payment receipt. Then navigate to the designated form and upload the image to complete the review process.

About.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Tamouh Educational Platform, a platform that seeks to empower teachers and learners with a unique experience combining quality and ease
About.featureDescription1: It seeks to improve educational outcomes and includes the efficiency of distinguished teachers in their field. The platform undoubtedly aims to produce a successful, creative generation in their academic field
About.featureDescription2: Our platform provides dynamic assessment tools including short tests and detailed reports to track progress. Both students and teachers can benefit from these tools to identify strengths and work on improving performance in other areas.

CourseDetails.courseDescription: Everything you need to know to start working in software testing
CourseDetails.review1: The course was excellent. I learned software testing basics from scratch and understood the difference between manual and automated testing. The videos were clear and easy to follow. Highly recommended for beginners!
CourseDetails.review2: The instructor's explanation was excellent and his style was very simple. I liked the practical exercises and the final project that helped me apply everything I learned practically. Thank you for this valuable course.
CourseDetails.lessonContentPlaceholder: Lesson content will be added soon
CourseDetails.overviewDescription: A comprehensive course aimed at teaching software testing principles and basics, starting from scratch until mastering the basic concepts and testing tools. Perfectly suitable for complete beginners in this field.
CourseDetails.learn1: Understanding software testing concepts and their importance in Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
CourseDetails.learn2: Learn manual testing basics, including writing test cases and documenting bugs
CourseDetails.learn3: Introduction to automated testing and tools like Selenium and JUnit
CourseDetails.learn4: How to write effective test reports and analyze results professionally
CourseDetails.learn5: Implement a practical project to apply acquired skills on real software
CourseDetails.audience1: Beginners wanting to enter the software testing field
CourseDetails.audience2: Developers who want to understand testing basics
CourseDetails.instructorBio: Professor Abdullah is specialized in software testing and computer science. He has extensive experience in academic teaching and providing practical training courses. He has a strong interest in helping learners gain a solid understanding of basic technical concepts and their practical application. He has trained hundreds of students on tools and technologies like Selenium and JUnit, helping them prepare for the technical job market.

step1.title: Choose Amount
step1.description: Decide how many credits you want to purchase. The conversion rate is 1 KWD = 1 Credit.

step2.title: Make Payment
step2.description: Transfer the exact amount to our bank account and save the payment receipt.

step3.title: Bank Details
step3.description: Use the following bank details to make your payment:
step3.note: Please include your email in the transfer description for faster processing

step4.title: Submit Request
step4.description: Upload your payment receipt and submit your credit purchase request. We'll process it within 24 hours.

delete_account.title: Delete Account
delete_account.subtitle: We're sorry to see you go!
delete_account.warning: Please note that deleting your account on Tamouh Educational Platform will permanently delete all your personal data, and this cannot be undone. Once deleted, you will not be able to access your account again or recover any of your data.
delete_account.courses_warning: Deleting your account may also result in loss of access to training courses you have previously enrolled in, as well as certified certificates you have obtained through Tamouh platform.
delete_account.backup_info: If you wish to keep a copy of your records or certificates before proceeding, you can check the instructions for downloading certificates or materials related to your courses.

modal.title: Delete Account
modal.description: This action cannot be undone. Please enter your password to confirm.
